title: Episode #1: Shane Harris on Drones
itunes:title: Episode #1: Shane Harris on Drones
itunes:subtitle: Our subject in the podcast's inaugural episode is a remarkable new article by journalist Shane Harris entitled "Out of the Loop: The Human-Free Future of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles."
description:
Our subject in the podcast's inaugural episode is a remarkable new article by journalist Shane Harris entitled "Out of the Loop: The Human-Free Future of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles."
